name: Scratch Aquatic Research Core
description:
Reposting from my Scratch Project: 

HTMLifier takes a few moments to load. Be patient.

B̲a̲s̲e̲d̲ ̲o̲f̲f̲ ̲o̲f̲ ̲P̲i̲n̲e̲w̲o̲o̲d̲ ̲C̲o̲m̲p̲u̲t̲e̲r̲ ̲C̲o̲r̲e̲, Discover Aquatic Research Facility and SCRATCH. The game is unstable, so if any bugs occur, click the green flag. Again.
Meltdown triggers at 4000. Freezedown triggers at -2000. Walk over items to obtain. Click to interact.
Use WASD to move, click to manually point- right click functionality isn't on scratch. I to open your inventory.
Welcome to SARC, Scratch Aquatic Research Core. Located under the [DATA EXPUNGED] Ocean, the Scratch Team researches new technologies.... and to take over the world... forget I said that...... Your job is to keep the core stable. When I say stable, I MEAN stable. If it gets too cold, everything turns to ice or shatters. Including you. If it gets too hot, the core will melt, contact the ocean water,  create a steam explosion and destroy the facility.
